SELECT ord.id AS id, ord.user_id AS user_id, ord.status AS status, ord.total_price AS total_price, ord.order_date AS order_date, ord.destination_name AS destination_name, ord.destination_email AS destination_email, ord.destination_zipcode AS destination_zipcode, ord.destination_address AS destination_address, ord.destination_tel AS destination_tel, ord.delivery_time AS delivery_time, ord.payment_method AS payment_method,
orditem.id AS order_item_id, items.id AS item_id, ord.id AS order_id, orditem.quantity AS quantity, orditem.size AS size,
items.name AS item_name, items.description AS item_description, items.price_m AS item_price_m, items.price_l AS item_price_l, items.image_path AS item_image_path,
ordtop.id AS order_topping_id, ordtop.order_item_id AS ordtop_order_item_id, toppings.id AS topping_id,
toppings.name AS topping_name, toppings.price_m AS topping_price_m, toppings.price_l AS topping_price_l
FROM orders AS ord LEFT OUTER JOIN order_items AS orditem ON ord.id = orditem.order_id LEFT OUTER JOIN order_toppings AS ordtop ON orditem.id = ordtop.order_item_id LEFT OUTER JOIN items ON items.id = orditem.item_id LEFT OUTER JOIN toppings ON toppings.id = ordtop.topping_id WHERE ord.user_id = #{userId} AND ord.status = #{status} ORDER BY orditem.id DESC, ordtop.id
